website_summaries.verdict: Basic, yet instantly useful, and provides a sturdy foundation for any interior design scheme.
pros: We love this go-to design that is nostalgic, yet still functional and needed
Folds up in a pinch and expands into a rolling frame that works for college dorms as well as high-end homes
Desirably priced and adjustable as well
cons: If pieces are missing, contact customer service right away for replacement

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: horrible bed frame. I have had it for 3 months with my queen size bed. It’s been creeking for the last month or so. Last night I sat on the edge of the bed and the whole wheel system collapsed. The metal brackets just bent in half. Legs sheared right off!! Now I need to support the whole thing with wood until I can replace the frame. WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Broke is 30 days.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this bed frame for 30 days. My seven year old daughter sat on the edge of the bed and the wheel brace collapsed. I consider this purchase a complete waste of my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks sturdy, packaging was minimal
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product since April, looks sturdy, packaging was minimal, worked on my Brazilian walnut floors. My first use was Thanksgiving week when my mother came to visit for a holiday. Please be aware that if you weigh 167lbs, and 5' 6" tall the middle support will bend. We were unable to bend back to the natural state. I emailed Best choice products to be told you never order from Best choice products, sent them a screen shot of my prime purchased to be told that product is past 90 days, no support from Best choice products.
customer_reviews.author: Tastie

customer_reviews.title: I chose wrong this time.
customer_reviews.text: I chose wrong this time. I'm the type to read the reviews when buying here on amazon but for this item, I feel like I wronged myself. I don't like this frame. It shifts and moves every time I shift and move. Every other day, I'd need to re-center the middle feet, until I grew frustrated altogether and put my boxspring and mattress back on the floor. I hate having my mattress on the floor but until I find a better solution, I'm appreciative of the boxspring and mattress not shifting when I move. I'll need to find something with a better design, which means that I'll need to raise my budget.
customer_reviews.author: Myster Reese

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Simply To Assemble - 2 Minutes And Voila
customer_reviews.text: This metal bed frame came in a long box that appeared to be damaged upon delivery, fortunately the contents were not. I was able to assemble it within 2 minutes - super easy. The extension bars at the head and feet are riveted in to the support rails on the sides and so they simply swing out. Connect them with the middle support bar and then place the wheels on the four corners and the stoppers on the middle support frame. Voila. Another great thing is that the metal is strong just as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Upshaw

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this item
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a damaged box. Some parts have the paint scratched off. One of the brackets for headboard bent so it can’t be used. Easy to assemble but the frame is crooked. I would send it back but until I take it apart, find a box big enough, and pay for shipping it would not be worth it. Lucky it was on sale and free shipping. Should have known there was a reason.......you get what you pay for. I wish that I had read the reviews before placing my order.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi M. Heuberger

customer_reviews.title: Very Dependable, but No Hardware included
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a bedroom suite I bought that didn't come with bed rails. These rails installed easily. Had to purchase screws, bolts, washers at Home Depot because hardware wasn't included. Would have been nice if hardware would have been included with rails. This was a really troublesome bed, no rails, so bought from Amazon, no hardware, so had to go to Home Depot. Didn't get to sleep in bed for about 2 weeks since I don't have a license & have to depend on others. However, I've had these rails supporting my bed for almost a year now and they're holding up great
customer_reviews.author: Jordy

customer_reviews.title: One of the side piece is somewhat longer than the ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the side piece is somewhat longer than the other one. I had a hard time putting it together and attached it to a head board, thinking that it would help to straight the frame out. But it did not. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Emile

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. So simple to put together. Totally adjustable from twin size or full size and queen size. Very sturdy, comes with the headboard mounting bracket and very stable Center support legs. I expect this to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very wimpy frame. It was easy to assemble but once together it became apparent that this is a lightweight frame and not very sturdy at all. Just a jiggle of the bed by hand and the frame wiggles. I am going to return this and get a more heavy duty one.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent frame
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bed frame. Very sturdy. Easy to assemble. Came with all the right parts. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chansen

customer_reviews.title: Just ok. The legs are a bit bent. ...
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. The legs are a bit bent. The wheels won't stay attached when moving the bed and I keep stubbing my toes on the back wheels due to thei placement at the very edge of the bed. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: patricia p rowell

customer_reviews.title: My queen size bed fits on the frame but it ...
customer_reviews.text: My queen size bed fits on the frame but it is longer than the frame. If I sit on the front edge of the bed, the back will lift up. Its not a big deal to me but it is something that people should be aware about.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy and quick to assemble. Very stable even without attaching it to a headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Horgan

customer_reviews.title: but it's perfectly fine for a spare/guest bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Fits my queen size mattress and box spring. The bed rolls around a little, but it's perfectly fine for a spare/guest bedroom. I wouldn't sleep on it every day, but a short-term stay seems to be just fine. I plan on getting bed risers to help with the movement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Solid and Heavy, this frame can hold almost anybody! The center support removes the need for slats. I even put it together myself in 20 minutes, and I’m by no means “handy”. If you need a queen bed frame, buy this one! One caveat... the box looked like it had been chewed by wolverines and dropped from a speeding van onto the highway. The frame inside was unaffected.
customer_reviews.author: Jodytoons

customer_reviews.title: Mattress does not lock into this because the size is ...
customer_reviews.text: Mattress does not lock into this because the size is slightly off. I am not sending back because of the hassle. I wish I would have just gotten the $40 one at Costco, but I tried the lazy way and had one delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and soild.
customer_reviews.text: This came in perfectly packed. Super easy to put together. Very sturdy and soild. Love they I came use the rollers for not.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: No good!
customer_reviews.text: I order this with a new full therapeutic separate mattress since I am pregnant and wanted something stable. ITS NOOOO GOOD AT ALL! Its wiggly, not stable and its weak. Not happy! It moves too much and rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Unis

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality-to get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. We purchased a queen for our 12-year old in September. 4 months later it is broken. Very cheap quality!
customer_reviews.author: jbock

customer_reviews.title: Great basic bed frame for the price! but not good for rolling in a path you need.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for holding up the bed, BUT those rollers do NOT move in any way you need at the time which make them almost useless... I have 6 of these frames and move the beds daily... Now will that bother you?? Probably not.
customer_reviews.author: Imburne

customer_reviews.title: Did not include center support
customer_reviews.text: Bed frame did not include the center support as advertised. I had to go through the hassle of repackaging and going through the return process.
customer_reviews.author: NRN

customer_reviews.title: Destroying my wood floors
customer_reviews.text: The wheels don't seem to actually lock so the frame rolls a lot and its chewing up my wood floors. So unhappy
customer_reviews.author: mfromboston

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, easy to put together, bed frame.
customer_reviews.text: This frame was easy to put together and very sturdy. The wheels were not always free rolling and it made it harder than it needed to be to move the bed. Perhaps with use, it will be easier to move.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap
customer_reviews.text: When we first bought this, I thought the bed moved around a lot and didn’t feel very secure. It was for my 16 year old son, so I wasn’t too worried. Today I noticed the box spring wasn’t sitting on the frame correctly and that the center support bar is bent. You get what you pay for. Don’t waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Hulsman

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Simple bedframe almost anybody can assemble it. Biggest complaint inserting the wheels is very difficult to get them to snap in. To ensure that they stay in you will need a mallet not a hammer
customer_reviews.author: Grim Pack

customer_reviews.title: This frame bent very easily and threw it out within first few month & ...
customer_reviews.text: This frame bent very easily and threw it out within first few month & the mattress barely sat on the mattress. The middle support never touch the ground either. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gant

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy. So far is pretty supportive but is unable ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy. So far is pretty supportive but is unable to roll on carpet due to the center supports. Then when you lift the frame to move it, the wheels fall off. If you have it in 1 spot & don't wish to move it, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ended up selling this because I do not like frames that require a box spring
customer_reviews.author: Keyanna Scott

customer_reviews.title: so this was a perfect answer for me
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bed frame with wheels because I have had a spinal fusion. I was unable to move the bed without the wheels, so this was a perfect answer for me. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, poor description
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, poor description. The product description shows the full size is 54 inches in width, it is not, the frame is actually 53.5 inches wide. The only reason I bought this was because I needed 54 inches wide...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Hard to put together. A second person would help holding in place. Richard
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stack

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A real disappointment. Had the bed only a 8 months (only used it 6 months however) when the frame bent and damaged the box spring. Now have to get new frame & box spring. :(
customer_reviews.author: Digi Reader

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not sturdy enough for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I didnt know how wrong a frame could go. Definitely not sturdy enough for everyday use. The wheels have nothing to hold them in place and they fold out randomly. Every time you sit on the bed it feels like its about to fall apart. This is a good buy if it is for a guest bed but certainly not for frequent use
customer_reviews.author: starlessnight86

customer_reviews.title: need better printed unstructionsd
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble without printed instructions is you have assemb,ed them before
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had with the product was that when I put it together the corners did not line up square. However I was still able to set the box spring on the frame. It was a lot cheaper purchasing it here than if I had purchased it at the mattress store where I bought my mattress.
customer_reviews.author: # 1 Hawks fan.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not very tall and the rollers just sit in the hole without a click to let you know they are secure so be careful if you go to pick the frame up if you need to move it because the legs will come right out. It gets the job done though.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: This frame comes complete and is fully adjustable for 3 different size Beds. This is set up now for a new queen size mattress and spring and will use existing headboard. Very good product and a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but there is about a inch gap ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but there is about a inch gap on each side after the box spring is installed on a full size mattress. Doesn't fall off but that gap does drive me a little insane due to my OCD. Good thing it's not my bed or I'd probably return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits just like it says it does for any size of bed
customer_reviews.author: Jo.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is too big and allows one side of the box spring to slip off the frame. This causes irritating & excessive squeaking not to mention the damage done to the box spring of my bed. Very poorly designed in my opinion as the support bar is totally in the wrong place.
customer_reviews.author: Izzibella

customer_reviews.title: Easy for one person to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy for one person to assemble. Quality, solid frame, easy to move around but casters lock so only moves when I want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Sue O.

customer_reviews.title: Fits three different size mattresses.
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived early and works fantastic. Easy to put together and fits my full-size mattress and box spring and can be adjusted to fit a queen should I decide to go bigger or it can be adjusted to fit a smaller full size mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki W.

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice Product Folding Adjustable Metal Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: It worked like a charm. We had no trouble adjusting and fitting the frame to my brother's full size bed. We were happy.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice Products Metal Bed Frame  Full  Size W/ Center Support Platform
customer_reviews.text: Its Well Worth The $43. I Used The Full Size Setting, And It Fit Great!! AAAAAA+++++++
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: This frame gets a F
customer_reviews.text: This is the quintessential poor constructed bed frame. The center supports of this frame are too high and make it sit unevenly. This is not adjustable unless you flip them or remove completely. If this is done, the middle of the frame rocks or the mattress sinks. From my mechanical engineering standpoint this gets a F.
customer_reviews.author: American Wireless Headquarters

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Came missing a screw, wheels are wobbly, sides are uneven and create a parallelogram shape instead of a square/rectangle. Not worth the money whatsoeverand gave out as soon as we laid down to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: emma salsbury

customer_reviews.title: Make sure of the length you order
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit my queen size bed.. They are good and sturdy but they are not long enough...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this product. The frame is bent, and the setting for the queen size has a gap between the box spring and the frame. This is the worst purchase I have ever made on Amazon in 10+ years I've been shopping with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Center bar & feet are great additions but the fit of the wheels is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item to replace and older frame that was too short for a twin bed. Sitting on the end of the bed could tilt the thing end-over-end. Not good for the kids safety. I'm happy with this item and found it easy to put together. It will also work for a regular or queen unit with just small adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Roy from Troy

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Silent
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy and simplistic bed frame. It's easy to put together and a very strong support.
customer_reviews.author: Seasoned Midget

customer_reviews.title: DIRECTIONS NEED EDITING, PRODUCT IS OK
customer_reviews.text: The directions were hard to follow. The structural bar fits in differently than pictured. However it is finall up and it was a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Johnson Kwartler

customer_reviews.title: The middle support base doesn't fit. The wheels that ...
customer_reviews.text: The middle support base doesn't fit. The wheels that go on the four corners and the pieces that are supposed to stabilize the center support are different heights.
customer_reviews.author: dale grust

customer_reviews.title: AS DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT. JUST CAN'T WAIT TO PUT MY KIDS BED TOGETHER WITH THE FRAME. :)
customer_reviews.author: Athena M. Vega

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good frame. Perfect to attached to a headboard. Heavy duty and a good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Good strong frame . Very easy to install and has wide wheels with locks .
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: buy this else where
customer_reviews.text: not evenly made even with bed placed and also didn’t come as shown as picture
customer_reviews.author: Magaly R

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy with fast shipping. The pricing was comparable to those that I could purchase elsewhere, I just love the convenience of having bulky items delivered to my door. Easy to assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Frame
customer_reviews.text: Was easily put together and have had it put together for about 2 months and have no problems. Would suggest this item and seller
customer_reviews.author: graciemc60

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Was squeaky from the beginning. 2 weeks into using it I cleaned under the bed and saw the middle bar is rotated and busted. 2 weeks!!!! Such a waste of money. Wish I could get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: AG85

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Made out of cheap metal. Not durable at all, broke after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Really like having the option of castors or 'feet'. Also like that you can adjust to different size beds.
customer_reviews.author: JDD

customer_reviews.title: worked perfect, secured together with 2 zip ties
customer_reviews.text: bought two to put two twins together to create quasi king. worked perfect, secured together with 2 zip ties. very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on the reviews. They were right. Very easy to assemble and no squeaking, creaking, or moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed frame, well made. The only issue was that it was beat up in shipment and was bent. I had to straighten.
customer_reviews.author: JDS

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it went together and it’s very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made in our opinion
customer_reviews.text: Frame was bent and hard to put together because of it, but had company coming, so we had to make it work. Lightweight, so I guess we got what we paid for at the low price
customer_reviews.author: B. Pinion

customer_reviews.title: It's a bed frame alright !
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for my full sized bed. How much can you say about a bed frame, it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Divagm

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put the bed frame together though there was ...
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put the bed frame together though there was 1 or 2 parts in the directions that wasn’t so clear, but I was still able to figure it out. Other wise the bed frame works and i haven’t had any problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Popped together easy. Holds my bed up off the floor. What more could I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this bed frame for months now and it’s pretty sturdy. I haven’t had any problems with it and assembling it was not hard. This is a great bed frame for my full size bed and I have no complaints! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Uneven legs
customer_reviews.text: The middle supports (which are not adjustable) are longer than the wheels, which makes the bed frame tippy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hoeman

customer_reviews.title: very solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid and easy to set up. I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It was supe quick shipping, and everything came as expected! I was able to assemble and set up my bed on my own! Instructions were easy to understand, bed fir perfectly and no tools required!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: great utility.
customer_reviews.text: Price either beat or was similar to all the bargain big box stores. This one is fantastic because you can use for any size twin to queen. A real plus
customer_reviews.author: ClaudiaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Heavy duty easy to put together If I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality Heavy duty easy to put together If I needed more I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and a good value
customer_reviews.text: Great bed frame for the price. Unlike others I found it to be sturdy when assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Bookenator

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Box was banged up in shipping, but product was undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: VHasan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is better than the one's without wheels and is better priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and simple 🤪🇺🇸🤷🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: Went together easy nice steel not real heavy gauge but just right squared up very easily all nuts and bolts accounted for everything went well.
customer_reviews.author: SPACE  SHOT

customer_reviews.title: Great  frame for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product - I was disappointed by others. No issues almost year later.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Came all bent. My husband had to use vice grips to bend it. Works fine now
customer_reviews.author: Julie lorden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother in law and she loves the height of the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Lenorah Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect...easy to put together,. Great price...delivered to my home on time
customer_reviews.author: Janice Baker Frazee

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, I have a full side bed. Assembly was easy. Excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing a bunch of necessary stuff.
customer_reviews.text: It was missing almost all of the hardware. Construction seem decent so far.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pitrone

customer_reviews.title: Great value-very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for us and much less expensive than anywhere local. I've recommended to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are cheap even when locked. The whole bed slides on smooth surfaces. Have to buy additional stoppers.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous 2018

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It arrived when it was promised and was fairly easy to put together. It seems to be fine - no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl K. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your box spring fits
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but can't hold more than 400lbs of persons without bending.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Fe

customer_reviews.title: Full size metal box spring would not fit
customer_reviews.text: My full size metal box spring would not fit. Where the holes were located for full size was too small and for queen size was too big. We had to drill new holes for my box spring to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Bent frame and damaged
customer_reviews.text: Received damaged and frame was bent rail on the left side . I am not happy at all it shows the price . You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The Box arrived on time but it was damaged some Hardware were missing. Too short for queen size mattress!
customer_reviews.author: NIDAL

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and easy to assemble. My only complaint is that I could’ve sworn it said no tools necessary to assemble but you need a screwdriver to attach the middle rod. Giving 3 stars because I have not had it enough time for a full review
customer_reviews.author: ahleighia

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend at all
customer_reviews.text: This frame is very cheap, unbalanced we had to put a piece of cardboard so that bed is not bouncing. The shipment was heavy, and when we have to replace I will go to a store first. I do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: el

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Prompt shopping as usual and product was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lost my bed frame while moving
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect frame for my bed and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth what I paid
customer_reviews.text: Was not sturdy at all. Support rail in center got twisted and bent inside of a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R. Scalone

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and will work. I haven't received the headboard yet so I can't comment on how it attaches to the frame. I would have given it 5 stars but the cross brace is uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Dee DeLine

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products Adjustable Metal Bed Frame for Twin, Full, Queen Sized Mattresses and Headboards w/Center Support
product_meta.description: Best Choice Products presents you this brand new adjustable metal bed frame. This bed frame is made of heavy-duty steel with center support that provides a sturdy support for your mattress and headboard. It also comes with 4 legs with sturdy locking wheeled rug rollers, and fits all twin, full, and queen size headboards! This bed was made foldable for easy transportation, easy to assemble, and requiring no tools for assembly. Rest well with this adjustable metal bed frame by Best Choice Products! SPECIFICATIONS: Twin Size Dimensions: 70"(L) x 39"(W) x 7.5"(H); Full Size Dimensions: 70"(L) x 54"(W) x 7.5"(H); Queen Size Dimensions: 70"(L) x 60"(W) x 7.5"(H); Weight: 24.3 lbs.; Weight Capacity: 660 lbs.; Material: Metal; Color: Black; Wheels: 2.5"(W); Some assembly required (with instructions).
feature_bullets: TWIN, FULL, AND QUEEN: Fully adjustable to fit all twin, full, and queen size headboards and mattresses
HEAVY-DUTY METAL: Supports up to 660 pounds, made of sturdy steel and a strong center support
LOCKING WHEELS: Each of the 4 legs have sturdy locking casters to roll the bed wherever you need and keep it securely in place
FOLDABLE AND PORTABLE: Fold it up for space-saving storage and move it around with ease
EASY ASSEMBLY: Sets up with no tools required! DIMENSIONS: Twin: 70"(L) x 60"(W) x 7.5"(H); Full: 70"(L) x 54"(W) x 7.5"(H); Queen: 70"(L) x 39"(W) x 7.5"(H)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars482 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
